page.title: 08Crime in Buntingford
page.content: We visited the Police Station. Crime in Buntingford is average.There is not really much vandalism in Buntingford.There has not been a dangerous criminal living in Buntingford in the last four and a half years.In Buntingford there are seven policemen working, including the sergeant. Crime has not risen much if at all. There has never been a shoot out in Buntingford. None of the policemen has been in a siege. There has never been a big robbery but the Post Office has been robbed a couple of times. There have been no drug suppliers in Buntingford. There have been many accidents in Buntingford. People have been killed. BY Darren Logan,Andrew Strachan and Andrew Page.
